attributes.action: Hold a public inquiry into tax avoidance
attributes.additional_details: A public inquiry should be held to make the British public aware of who and what extent political figures and the wealthy took part in tax evasion in terms of offshore bank accounts.
attributes.background: Since 11 million documents were leaked from legal firm mossack fonseca many world leaders have been under the spotlight for their role in tax avoidance. I believe a public inquiry should be held into the 11 million leaked documents from mossack fonseca and into tax avoidance.
